overview: Brea Bennett bursts the barriers of polite conduct in this lurid adventure conceived by Laurent Sky. Scene after delectable scene peeks inside the unconventional thoughts of Club Jenna's youngest contract star and shivers at the juicy secrets behind her angelic smile. Brea just can't behave herself. She conspires with her pinstriped and provocative cohort Roxy Jezel, schemes her way out of Jerry's jail sentence on her knees, and takes a different brand of penetrating punishment from Barry Scott. Not satisfied yet? Release a little professional tension with Brooke Haven in a forbidden office tryst with Jack Lawence. Grind through a gritty gropefest in an alley with Kelly Tyler and Mario Rossi. Club Jenna and Skyworld dare you to explore these steamy escapades and see who's banging Brea next.
tagline: There Is Nothing Wrong With Your Picture. Do Not Attempt To Adjust Volume. We Control The Image. Club Jenna Is On The Air.
title: Bangin' Brea
